com.buyanova.repository.user

Interface UserRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Repository<User>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SqlUserRepository

    public interface UserRepository
extends Repository<User>
    Interface used to mark classes that implement data access for User entity.
    See Also:
    Repository, User

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNumberOfRecords()
      Returns number of records in the data source for User entity.
      void unblock(User user)
      Marks user as active in the specified data source.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.buyanova.repository.Repository

        add, query, remove, update

    • Method Detail

      • unblock

        void unblock(User user)
      throws RepositoryException
        Marks user as active in the specified data source.
        Parameters:
        user - user that is to be unblocked in the data source.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if a data source access error occurs

                throws RepositoryException

        number of records in the data source for User entity
        Throws:
